name: Zombierobo
description:
a wave shooter, shoot for the high score , the title screen is crap, it was made in 2 minutes dont judge :) but the rest of the game is great

YOU CANT JUMP!!!!

made for the brackeys jam 2021.1 , was a blast working on it and meeting all of you on the discord and in #streaming1 and #streaming2, would love to do it again, we are going 3d next time, @aaryaman1112#5059 im coming against you mate, also special thanks to @alex!#3319 and to @ZaCkOX-i eat rexs to survive@#2706
